name: img2txt-chrome-a11y
description: Generates image descriptions for use with screen readers

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist/src && cp src/content.js dist/src/ && cp -r popup dist/
scripts.build: parcel build src/background.js --dist-dir dist/src/ && npm run copy
scripts.watch: npm run copy && parcel watch src/background.js --dist-dir dist/src/
